Text: All these "Freaks of Boobs" vids are fucking amateur hour. They think that by using a hugely wide-angle lens and zooming in on the tits that dudes will think the tits are more than ordinary tits and make the little red neck trucker guy doing the fucking look as if he is well hung. It doesn't and when they forget and pan up to the bitch's (usually ugly-ass) face, she look like daffy, moon-faced, 40 year old retarded  woman. Stupid. The whole series is like that, and to make it worse you have some little myron in the POV camera "interviewing" the ho and making pathetic comments about how "huge" the tits are. It's like watching Asian TV or American sit coms where they have to tell you were you should laugh (or in this case get horny) by the sound effects.
